dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazhydromet just put out a warning for Astana and a few other cities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazhydromet just put out a warning for Astana and a few other cities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet has issued a weather warning for residents of Astana and other cities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that. It's for June 10th, right? Unfavorable meteorological conditions, they're calling it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that. It's for June tenth, right? Unfavorable meteorological conditions, they're calling it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "On June 10, 2025, unfavorable meteorological conditions are expected in the city of Aktobe and at night in the cities of Kostanay, Atyrau, and Astana," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it's not just Astana—Aktobe, Kostanay, and Atyrau are also affected, especially at night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And it's not just Astana-Aktobe, Kostanay, and Atyrau are also affected, especially at night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "On June 10, 2025, unfavorable meteorological conditions are expected in the city of Aktobe and at night in the cities of Kostanay, Atyrau, and Astana," the statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it's all because of this temperature inversion thing they mentioned. It basically traps the cold air underneath the warm air.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it's all because of this temperature inversion thing they mentioned. It basically traps the cold air underneath the warm air.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Inversion is a weather phenomenon where warm air settles above cold air, effectively trapping it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, so normally pollution would rise and disperse, but during an inversion, it just hangs around near the ground.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, so normally pollution would rise and disperse, but during an inversion, it just hangs around near the ground.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Normally, warmer air near the surface rises and carries pollutants away. But during an inversion, the colder air stays trapped below, along with vehicle emissions, dust, and smoke.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which means all those vehicle emissions and dust just accumulate. Not great for air quality in urban areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which means all those vehicle emissions and dust just accumulate. Not great for air quality in urban areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, pollution accumulates near the ground"especially in urban areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Especially since the wind is supposed to be pretty light at night, like 3 to 8 meters per second. That calm weather doesn't help clear things out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially since the wind is supposed to be pretty light at night, like three to eight meters per second. That calm weather doesn't help clear things out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Northeast and east winds: 3"8 m/s at night and 9"14 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But during the day, it picks up a bit, uh, 9 to 14 m/s, which might help a little.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But during the day, it picks up a bit, uh, nine to fourteen meters per second, which might help a little.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Northeast and east winds: 3"8 m/s at night and 9"14 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the temperatures sound pretty mild—dropping to around +9 to +11 at night and up to +24 or +26 in the daytime.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the temperatures sound pretty mild-dropping to around +nine to +eleven at night and up to +twenty four or +twenty six in the daytime.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The temperature will drop to +9¦+11ÂC at night and rise to +24¦+26ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So overall comfortable and dry, but with that pollution risk, people might want to limit time outside, especially in the evening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So overall comfortable and dry, but with that pollution risk, people might want to limit time outside, especially in the evening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The weather will be comfortable and dry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It's one of those days where the weather seems nice but has that hidden downside.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It's one of those days where the weather seems nice but has that hidden downside.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, inversions are sneaky like that. You don't always see them coming.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, inversions are sneaky like that. You don't always see them coming.
